data.actual_result: nothing happens unless you tap the bubble
data.expected_result: it changes theme regardless of where you tap on the theme option
data.short_description: Tapping "Dark/Light" in theme selection does nothing on 613. It only applies the change if you tap the bubble.
data.steps_to_repro: - go into settings > theme selection - tap the words "light" or "dark" -notice nothing happens
